review: The Fire TV Stick is a fairly amazing piece of technology both for its cost and size. Out of the box it will be paired with your Amazon account so you literally need to do nothing more than plug it into a HDMI port and power. I've been impressed by the range of apps available out of the gate. I wasn't sure of the remote and feared it would be too small to be useful but it's actually quite good.I also have a Chromecast which I think fills a different purpose. Since this is standalone I actually find it easier to use than fiddling with my phone.
